item.title: pyturbo library
item.description: Objectives Demonstrate modeling and design capabilities based on CoSApp. Provide a turbofan Open-Source library for training and as a base block of advanced simulations workflows. Current status A turbofan (2 shafts) architecture is covered from single physics/components to the full product, using modular intermediate assemblies. Multiple off-design and design strategies are available as numerical workflows. Turbofan engine being scaled by the user in real time. Aircraft digital twin mounted with 2 turbofans.
